albumplayer.xsh.description: Play an album using cmus, with album selection via dmenu.

ardour-open.sh.description: A script to open an Ardour session selected from a list.

chatgpt-all-scripts-describer.py.description: Generates GitHub markdown documentation for user scripts using OpenAI's API.

chezmoi_on_a_new_system.sh.description: This script sets up the Chezmoi configuration management tool on a new system.

citeboard.sh.description: A script to copy citations or open papers from a bibliography.

colormap_from_text.sh.description: Extracts unique color palettes from text files based on specified output formats.

count_tokens_with_tiktoken.py.description: A script to count the number of tokens in a text file using tiktoken.

create_cover_art.sh.description: Generate cover art from an audio file's spectrogram in PNG format.

dmenu_run_scripts.py.description: A script to select and run scripts using rofi, inspired by dmenu_run.

dmenu_run_scripts.xsh.description: Run user scripts in an interactive menu powered by dmenu/rofi.

edit_chezmoi_cfg_files.sh.description: Launches an interactive file selector to edit Chezmoi-managed configuration.

editor.sh.description: Edit any file in current folder or subfolders (recursively)

fzf_albumlauncher.xsh.description: Launches an album from Beet using fzf to interactively select and play it with cmus.

fzfmenu_run.sh.description: A script to replace dmenu with fzf for launching applications in a floating terminal.

fzfmenu.sh.description: Launches an interactive fzf menu in an xterm window.

fzf_songlauncher.sh.description: Play a song with cmus (choose it with fzf)

get_repos_present_on_host.sh.description: This script collects Git repository paths from a specified directory and saves them to a file.

git_clone_by_author-repo.sh.description: A script to clone GitHub repositories via SSH or HTTPS based on user preferences.

improved-fzfmenu.sh.description: A script to launch an FZF menu in Alacritty terminal.

jupyter_new_notebook.xsh.description: This script creates a new Jupyter notebook and opens it in Chromium.

launch_tmux_with_music_player.sh.description: A script to start a new tmux session for cmus music player.

list_process.sh.description: List and sort running services on a Linux system using systemctl.

llama-all-scripts-describer.py.description: Generates GitHub documentation for scripts using Llama 3.1 model.

llm-script-describer.py.description: Generate markdown documentation for user scripts with AI assistance.

m3u_creator.sh.description: Create an m3u file from music files in the current directory.

mechen_music_transfert.py.description: Custom script to copy music to the Mechen device.

midi2arch.xsh.description: Transform a midi controller to a keyboard/script launcher

next_album.xsh.description: Skip to the next album in cmus player and handle playlist management.

obsidian.xsh.description: Open a selected Obsidian vault using fzfmenu.

pdfopener.sh.description: A simple script to find and open PDF files using Evince.

playlist_player.xsh.description: A script to select and play a playlist using cmus.

playlist_randomizer.xsh.description: Randomly selects and plays albums from a specified playlist in cmus.

ppm-color-reducer.description: This script reduces the colors in a PPM image using a specified color palette.

random_album.xsh.description: Select a random album and play it with cmus.

random_wallpapers.xsh.description: Pick random wallpaper from a predefined list using Xonsh.

sandisk_music_transfert.py.description: Transfer music from the local library to a Sandisk media player.

script_launcher.sh.description: Run scripts with fzf in a user-friendly interface.

select_script.description: A script that selects a chosen script using cached data and executes it.

songlauncher.sh.description: Plays a song with cmus using dmenu for song selection.

sync-repo.sh.description: A script to sync a Git repository with fetch, rebase, and handle conflicts.

tmux-help.py.description: A script to assist with tmux command lookup and management.

toggle_picom.sh.description: A script to toggle the Picom compositor on and off.

transform_symlink.sh.description: Replace a symbolic link with its target file.

update_env.xsh.description: Updates the `.env` file with API keys stored in the current environment.

utils_update_symlinks.sh.description: Creates and manages symlinks in ~/.local/bin, logging activity.

vimwiki.sh.description: Launch Vim with a selected note from the notes directory.

vox.py.description: List various Vox amp options and their descriptions.

wallpaper.sh.description: Pick random wallpaper or select from a list and set it as the desktop wallpaper.

you_are_not_documented.sh.description: A script that finds scripts without inline documentation.
